segments.text: I notice the little girl standing there, looking up at her brother with such hope.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s so small, and she’s just waiting for him to give her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s the smart one, not climbing up like he is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really taking a risk, standing on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve planned this together or if she’s just taking advantage of the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still pouring out of the sink, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the girl if the stool tips and her brother falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent, just standing there with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they both get what they want without anyone getting hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just so chaotic, but she seems so calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s the only one who’s not in any immediate danger.
segments.speaker: PAR
